title: Pothi Vecha Lyrics Annakodiyum Kodiveeranum  Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: G. V. Prakash Kumar, Prashanthini
Song: Pothi vecha
Lyrics: Arivumathi
Movie: Annakodiyum Kodiveeranum
Music: G.V.Prakash Kumar		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Pothi vecha aasathaan
othukichu pesathaan
sillu vandu paarthudhaan
sirikiradhey ..

Pathivitta aaduthaan
patti vandhu serndhudhaan
pattavali yaavumey inikiradhey..

Anjukuyil koovaadho
nenjukuli aaraadho
natha nandu poley naan
nasungi poreyney

pathukili pesaadho
unkuralaa maaraadho
vaththa thanni meena naan
vandhangi poreyney

Uludhupota puzhudhi pola
vaanam paarthu naan vaaduren
eechangaatu oothapola
nenaikka pogiren .. oh .. o

Kokku meenaanen
oru kadhaiyil naanundhen
oppuku thaayaanen
urugudhu usuru

Aanja kaayi polave
saanja thohu kaayudhey
kuyilu udanji kumuri azhuga
aaru aanadhey ..ye.. ye..

Thandhetti kaadhaaga
valandhuruchu sogam thaan
mansatti odaaga udanjadhu usuru..

Oda meenum paanjadhey
naanal poovum saanjadhey
kozhuthum veyile nadikum azhagu
saaral saaraley ....

Pothi vacha aasathaan
othukichu pesathaan
sillu vandu paarthudhaan
rasikiradhey ..

Pathivitta aaduthaan
patti vandhu serndhudhaan
pattavali yaavumey inikiradhey..

Anjukuyil koovaadho
nenjukuli aaraadho
natha nandu poley naan
nasungi poreyney

pathukili pesaadho
unkuralaa maaraadho
vaththa thanni meena naan
vandhangi poreyney

Uludhupota puzhudhi pola
vaanam paarthu naan vaaduren
eechangaatu oothapola
nenaikka pogiren .. oh .. o English Translation
I tried my best :)
